item.description: Go back home: ⭐ Main ⭐ Finished / Incomplete 3.1.1 - Understand the ethical and moral issues that an increasing reliance on technology raises, and how organisations and individuals can respond to these challenges One way that organizations and individuals can respond to these challenges is by implementing policies and practices that promote responsible use of technology and digital services.
